    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Enzyme for breakdown of insoluble molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enzym für Zusammenbruch der unlöslichen 
Moleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enzyme pour la panne des molécules insolubles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enzyme para a avaria de moléculas insoluble</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Enzima per la ripartizione delle molecole 
insolubili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένζυμο για τη διακοπή των αδιάλυτων μορίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enzima para la ruptura de moléculas insolubles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the breakdown of large, insoluble molecules to small, soluble molecules using an enzyme.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Digestion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enzymes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">insoluble molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">soluble molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Zusammenbruch der 
großen, unlöslichen Moleküle zu den kleinen, löslichen Molekülen 
mit einem Enzym.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la panne de grandes, 
insolubles molécules à de petites, solubles molécules en utilisant 
une enzyme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a avaria de moléculas 
grandes, insoluble às moléculas pequenas, soluble usando um enzyme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la ripartizione di 
grandi, molecole insolubili alle piccole, molecole solubili usando un 
enzima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διακοπή των μεγάλων, 
αδιάλυτων μορίων στα μικρά, διαλυτά μόρια χρησιμοποιώντας ένα 
ένζυμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ruptura de 
moléculas grandes, insolubles a las moléculas pequeñas, solubles 
usando una enzima.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdauung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enzyme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
